fields.description:
Description:
1.Run the command in CLI :
  "ti build -p android -f --build-only -d 'proj-dir' "
2.Check out the output on cli

Actual result:
1.The project builds but the CLI waits for the device
We see something like this:
{code}
[INFO]  Project built successfully in 6s 209ms

[DEBUG] C:\Users\QEtester\Desktop\android-sdk-windows\platform-tools\adb.exe start-server
- waiting for device -
{code}

Expected Result:
1.The CLI should only build the project but not wait for the device in build only senario
fields.summary: CLI : CLI 'waits for the device' even though the build only flag is specified in the command for android
fields.environment:
Environment:
CLI version :3.0.24-cr
Win 8
MAC OSX 10.8.2
linux 12.04 LTS

comments.body:
Dupe of TIMOB-12034.

Besides Android build current does not honor the --build-only flag. It should produce the same identical results as without the flag. This will be fixed for 3.2.0.
Closing ticket as duplicate with reference to the above comments.
